column2: You meet a club Mistresses and prepare the slave auction with her.
You're asked about her training progress and the time spent together.
The market gets pretty crowded and Dommes come to check your slave.
The bidding starts slowly but steadily, as your girl starts to get nervous.
Customers raise the auction price and asks you personal questions on her.
The price finally sticks at DoubleAmount$.  Everyone applauses the lucky buyer.
Your slave gives you one last loving hug and walks away with the customer.
You're getting paid AuctionAmount$.  The other half belongs to the Bondage Club.
The club Mistress thanks you and leads you out.  (Click anywhere to end.)
